meanings.definition: A lengthy or tedious discussion or conversation.
meanings.sent1: The talkfest about the new project lasted all afternoon.
meanings.sent2: The family reunion turned into a talkfest about old memories.
meanings.sent3: The talkfest between the two politicians seemed never-ending.
meanings.sent4: The talkfest in the office was like a never-ending loop of words.
meanings.sent5: The talkfest in the classroom made the students sleepy.

meanings.definition: An event or gathering characterized by excessive talking.
meanings.sent1: The charity event turned into a talkfest with everyone sharing stories.
meanings.sent2: The talkfest at the party kept everyone entertained.
meanings.sent3: The talkfest at the library was louder than expected.
meanings.sent4: The talkfest in the park was like a symphony of voices.
meanings.sent5: The talkfest during the game distracted the players.
